Company Overview.Name: Welspun Enterprises Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: Part of the USD 2.7 billion Welspun Group. Operates in the infrastructure space with investments in oil & gas. Focused on road and water sectors, mainly Hybrid Annuity Model (HAM) projects, also undertakes BOT-Toll and EPC projects.
Company Overview.Market Position: Part of Nifty Microcap 250, BSE SmallCap, BSE Allcap, BSE Industrials, Nifty Total Market

Pros: Company has delivered good profit growth of 20.8% CAGR over last 5 years
Cons: Stock is trading at 3.27 times its book value
Company has a low return on equity of 11.2% over last 3 years.
